Description.0: Continuous Assessment: Fortnightly online MCQ's (10 questions per test) based on lectures, readings or tutorials
Description.1: Essay: Essay (2000 words) where you write & illustrate a critical evaluation of one of the archaeological reconstructions at the National Heritage Park based on completed workbook
Description.2: Project: Museum Workbook (1200 words) requiring you to describe three artefacts in the National Museum and discuss their archaeological significance
